nodes.text: Blade's Edge was a heavily modified Z-95-AF4 Headhunter starfighter that was operated by the Kadas'sa'Nikto bounty hunter Kaa'to Leeachos during the early years of the Galactic Empire. After Leeachos incurred the ire of the Pyke Syndicate and went on the run, he took shelter in the NovaCORE kelerium processing plant in The Works region of the planet Coruscant, docking Blade's Edge inside an exhaust vent in an abandoned annex of the factory. A group of Pyke-affiliated agents eventually tracked Leeachos to the plant, and he attempted to flee aboard the Headhunter.
